articles.title: Bayern Munich seeks consistency to make Lazio win the start of a turnaround

articles.title: China accuses US of devising tactics to suppress China despite improvement in relations

articles.title: Modi visits Kashmir's main city for the first time since revoking region's semi-autonomy
articles.description: India's powerful home minister, Amit Shah, has repeatedly promised that the region would regain statehood after elections.

articles.title: From Blue Mountains, Pepper eyes fastest no O2 ascent of 14 peaks
articles.description: An Australian woman climber is all set to leave for Mt Annapurna in a bid to complete all 14 peaks above 8,000m without using supplemental oxygen.

articles.title: EPR is most efficient curb on plastic pollution, say experts

articles.title: Rare diseases in Nepal: Lack of resources and medicines multiply the patients' hardships
articles.description: World Health Organization (WHO) delineated rare diseases as conditions affecting a small fraction of the population, specifically fewer than 1 in 2,000 individuals within a given populace.

articles.title: South Korea sets Thursday as deadline for striking young doctors to return to work
articles.description: South Korea's government gave striking young doctors four days to report back to work, saying Monday that they won't be punished if they return by the deadline but will face indictments and suspensions of medical licenses if they don't.

articles.title: Glimpses into autobiography of mountaineer Lhakpa Sonam Sherpa
articles.description: Senior tourism entrepreneur Lhakpa Sonam Sherpa, who successfully scaled Mt Everest last year, has proposed to form a special committee comprising representatives from different agencies to monitor mountaineering expeditions in the Everest base camp.

articles.description: Modi’s party denies using law enforcement agencies to target the opposition and says the agencies act independently.

articles.title: Life is a process: It is also balance
articles.description: Our life is like the seasons. It is simple; it is complex; it is also, at times, tetchy. Yet, in the midst of happiness and chaos, it is as exciting as a nail-biting Twenty20 cricket match.

articles.description: Nepal and the UK have signed two grant agreements - the Nepal in Business (NIB) programs and the implementation of Green Growth Nepal (GGN) programs on Tuesday.

articles.title: Policy against same individual owning business and bank, says PM Dahal

articles.title: Ben Affleck inspired J.Lo's first album in a decade. She's using it to poke fun at her romantic past
articles.description: Throughout her career, Jennifer Lopez has been hailed as an epochal, prolific and hard-working artist.

articles.title: Plight of youth who escaped from Russian army

articles.title: Bank interest should only increase with consent of both parties: UML Chair Oli

articles.title: High Court Patan issues stay order over PADT executive director appointment
articles.description: The High Court Patan has issued an interim order asking the Pashupati Area Development Trust (PADT), Governing Council to refrain from implementing its decision to appoint Laxmi Pun as the executive director of the PADT.

articles.title: Remaining works of peace process to be completed on consensus: PM Dahal
articles.description: Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal 'Prachanda' has expressed the belief that the remaining works of the peace process would be completed on the basis of consensus.

articles.title: High-speed, high-scoring Loïs Openda and Leipzig aim to end Leverkusen's unbeaten run
